com.tealium.lifecycle

Class LifeCycle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tealium.lifecycle.LifeCycle

  • public final class LifeCycle
extends java.lang.Object
    Module for managing application lifecycle. When used, this module populates the lifecycle_* events defined in DataSources.Key.

      • getCurrentState

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getCurrentState()

        Populated a map with

        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_DAYSSINCELAUNCH
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_DAYOFWEEK_LOCAL
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_HOUROFDAY_LOCAL
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_TOTALSECONDSAWAKE
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_FIRSTLAUNCHDATE
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_FIRSTLAUNCHDATE_MMDDYYYY
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_LASTLAUNCHDATE
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_TOTALLAUNCHCOUNT
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_LAUNCHCOUNT
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_TOTALWAKECOUNT
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_WAKECOUNT
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_TOTALSLEEPCOUNT
        • DataSources.Key.LIFECYCLE_SLEEPCOUNT

        when isAutoTracking() is true, this data is added to every track call.

        Returns:
        populated map

      • setupInstance

        public static LifeCycle setupInstance(java.lang.String instanceId,
                      Tealium.Config config,
                      boolean isAutoTracking)
        This method needs to be called before calling Tealium.createInstance(String, Tealium.Config) in order for the data to track correctly.
        Parameters:
        instanceId - Tealium instance id
        config - Tealium.Config of the Tealium instance
        isAutoTracking - whether the module should handle its own LifeCycle tracking

      • getInstance

        public static LifeCycle getInstance(java.lang.String instanceId)
        When manually tracking (isAutoTracking() is false) this method will return an instance previously setup by setupInstance(String, Tealium.Config, boolean).
        Returns:
        an instance if created, otherwise null.
